item.title: Chelsea Rocked As Brighton Hand Graham Potter His First Defeat
item.description: Chelsea Rocked As Brighton Hand Graham Potter His First Defeat Chelsea boss Graham Potter suffered a humiliating return to Brighton as his former club ended his unbeaten start with a stunning 4-1 victory at the Amex Stadium on Saturday

item.title: Is there anything Messi can’t do? Watch his stunning strike and soft defence splitting pass to Neymar
item.description: Is there anything Messi can’t do? Watch his stunning strike and soft defence splitting pass to Neymar Lionel Messi grabbed a goal and assist to inspire Paris St Germain to a 4-3 comeback victory over Troyes on Saturday as the Ligue 1 table-toppers extended their lead to five points.

item.title: Odisha FC Make Stunning Comeback To Register First Home Win of ISL Season
item.description: Odisha FC Make Stunning Comeback To Register First Home Win of ISL Season Harmanjot Khabra scored in the 35th minute to give the Blasters the lead before Jerry Mawihmingthanga equalised in the 54th minute and team-mate substitute Pedro Martin won it for Odisha in the 86th.

item.title: Southampton v Arsenal: Premier League – live
item.description: Southampton v Arsenal: Premier League – live Match at St Mary’s kicks off at 2pm BSTGet in touch with Gregg via email or on TwitterThe teams are out at St Mary’s on what has ended up being a lovely day for football after the torrential showers earlier.
